featured.text: Trade is certainly a main 30 force for globalization.
Whether or not zoos benefit the animal community, they certainly do make money.
Our team will certainly win this baseball game, because all the players are highly ________.
Love is, __(40)__, magical, and it certainly can last if we remember our differences and respect each other.

other.text: And this is certainly a serious warning about the depressing fate of other glaciers around the world.
This is certainly good news for cash-strapped students.
Dad certainly had the list 33 when he left for the market, but he would somehow forget it, and then would find it again only after he returned home.

definition.example: I will certainly help you with your project.
